comment: The best Workshop I had ever attended. Dima as a nice technique and he makes sure that everyone understand the concept! Highly recommend it.
The Workshop was great. I realize that my technique was totally wrong. Thanks so much Dima to explain in the easiest way we could understand.
The workshop was excellent, I just wound like more food were available.
Best new year ever. The organizers did an amazing job planing this event. Would love to attend next year.
I love to spend new year dancing until morning. Thank you to the ones who work to make it happen.
It was my first time doing Argentine Tango and the teacher was so kinda! Highly recommend.
This Practica is perfect, it should never have to end.
We have such an amazing time dancing and having fun with everyone.
Best Christmas ever I had since I was a kid.
Amazing Christmas atmosphere, nice music and best dances I ever had.
This was such I nice idea to get together everyone out of town. I will definitely come back next year.
I danced so much that I couldn't barely walk the next day. Highly recommend it.
Amazing time with friends. Great dances and wonderful music.
I love to dance with this crew, Amazing time here.
I really like how the organizes planned this event. Will always attend it when I'm in town.
Really learned a lot of basic techniques that you usually don't see teachers including in their classes.
I always enjoy this class, so much fun and got to know new friends.
